participant_1.background:
I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background.
last season i was just getting started.
my favorite food is mashed potatoes.
i am the youngest of five.
i write fiction for fun.

participant_2.background:
I watch YouTube videos about welding to learn new things and keep my mind off my best friend who just moved away.
I am often up late at night working on my art, so I'm not a morning person.
I start my day with coffee and a quick practice session before heading off to city council meetings.
I drank a cup of chai tea before going to bed.
i play tabletop games with friends.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I'm well, thanks! I'm a bit tired, but I'm looking forward to starting my day.
I'm glad to hear it! I'm doing well too. I'm looking forward to working on some new fiction today.
That's great! What kind of fiction do you write?
I mostly write fantasy. I'm working on a new story about a group of adventurers who are trying to save the world from an evil wizard.
That sounds really cool! I love fantasy stories. I'm more of a sci-fi person myself, but I can appreciate a good fantasy story.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it. What kind of sci-fi do you like?
I like all kinds of sci-fi, but I'm especially interested in space opera and cyberpunk.
Those are both great genres! I love space opera too. I'm not as big on cyberpunk, but I can appreciate it.
Yeah, I can see how cyberpunk wouldn't be for everyone. It's not always the most accessible genre.
Yeah, it can be a bit dark and gritty. But I think it's really cool how it explores the future of technology and society.
I agree! It's really interesting to see how people think the future will be.
Yeah, it's one of the things I love about sci-fi. It's a great way to explore different ideas and possibilities.
I agree! It's one of the reasons why I love it so much
